author: CTPPS
body:
#### PR description:

Default source of PPS alignment is changed to CondDB via auto GT.

This is a follow up of #25495 - the extra PR has been made in order not to disrupt the ongoing sign off of #25495.

The only two differences wrt. #25495 are:
 * 4b1707395f99fcc8669baf6c7f38fa04c4230e8f : cherry-pick of @tocheng's 2490f473de6540804b070b5ede3d18757b820b08 where auto GTs are updated
 * b941c47806c49004115062e81ac98b951aaa9c23: update to PPS configuration to use the alignment from DB

#### PR validation:

Some matrix tests run on LXPLUS, no problem related to this PR observed.

AddOd tests run on LXPLUS, yielding `47 tests passed, 0 failed`.

The quality of pixel reconstruction is maintained, below an example from 2017 ZeroBias data. The small difference is expected, the DB contains a newer version of the pixel internal alignment wrt. the XML currently in the release.

![pixel_quality](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17830858/54913490-223db680-4ef3-11e9-8187-5d4f8586900d.png)

The output of proton reconstruction is reasonable. Below an example from multi-RP reco of 2016 data (run 275371).

![proton reco](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17830858/54914343-0b985f00-4ef5-11e9-89cf-9a2b16d41bf5.png)
title: PPS: alignment from auto GT
